overview: As Executive Vice President of Ener1, Inc. and CEO of EnerDel, Ulrik Grape brings more than 18 years of experience in senior management, business development, manufacturing and finance to the firm. Ulrik is one of the eminent voices within the lithium-ion industry, having previously spent ten years at Danionics A/S, an international lithium-ion battery company headquartered in Denmark. In his role as Sales and Marketing Director and Vice President U.S., he successfully secured major contracts for lithium-ion polymer rechargeable batteries, while developing strong customer relationships with leading United States portable electronic product manufacturers.
